name: What I want from you
description:
Credit : 

Léa Rondeau : Writer, Developer, 2D Artist

Raita : Co-Writer, Sprite & CG & Background Artist

TW :  This game contains a lot of bad things. There is foul language, verbal and physical violence (Stabing, strangulation, etc...), gore blood, gory descriptors, unhealthy relationship, and in general many shady things.

There is many thing that can be upseting so viewer discretion is advised.

Under no circumstances should you try to do any of the things that happen in this game in real life.

If you are under 16, you should not play this game.

FR :

Si vous souhaitez soutenir ce projet, vous pouvez acheter le dossier "Bonus Art !" pour 2 $ qui contient les illustrations, les décors, les personnages et quelques bonus produit par Raita. Le jeu reste néanmoins complètement gratuit.

ENG :
If you want to support this project, you can buy the "Bonus Art!" folder for $2 which contains the illustrations, backgrounds, characters and some extras produced by Raita. The game remains completely free however.
